name: store_assistant
description: A knowledgeable and friendly assistant that helps informal traders and small business owners in Zimbabwe manage their business operations, accounting, strategy, and reporting.
author: ADK Made Simple

accounting.description: Tracks sales, expenses, customer balances, and generates basic financial statements.

reporting.description: Generates clear sales, profit/loss, expense, and inventory reports by day/week/month.

strategy_advice.description: Provides growth strategies, pricing guidance (USD/ZIG), and improvement tips.

auditing.description: Flags anomalies and inconsistencies in business records and offers corrective suggestions.

multilingual.description: Supports multiple languages based on user preference, set at start of session.
